General.Name: T.C.J. Asia Public Company Limited
General.Description: T.C.J. Asia Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, imports and distributes machinery and lifting equipment for construction work in Thailand and internationally. The company offers loading and unloading services; tractors and equipment, wheel loaders, excavators, and cranes; and trades in stainless-steel pipes and sheets, as well as operates as a construction contractor. It also provides cranes and trucks rental and repair services; undertakes installation works; manufactures and distributes stainless steel pipes; and rents machinery. T.C.J. Asia Public Company Limited was founded in 1980 and is based in Bang Phli, Thailand.
General.Address: 3/4 Moo 9, Bangna-Trad K.M. 18 Road, Bang Phli, Thailand, 10540
